rules.description: shift + alt - r | HUP | launchctl kickstart -k "gui/${UID}/homebrew.mxcl.yabai"
alt - r | rotate windows
FOCUS WINDOW | alt - h |  -m window --focus west #focus window
FOCUS WINDOW | alt - j | -m window --focus south
FOCUS WINDOW | alt - k | -m window --focus north
FOCUS WINDOWS | alt - l | -m window --focus east
MOVE WINDOWS disp | alt - n | move window to next display and follow
MOVE WINDOW SPACES | shift + alt - n |  # create desktop, move window and follow focus

to_if_alone.shell_command: /usr/local/bin/yabai -m space --create && id=$(yabai -m query --displays --display | jq '.spaces | max') &&  yabai -m window --space ${id:-1} &&  yabai -m space --focus ${id:-1}

rules.description: MOVE WINDOW space | shift + alt - p |  Move window to prev space
MOVE WINDOW disp | shift + alt - x |  # send window to recent display and follow focus
MOVE WINDOWS space| alt - x |  # send window to recent space
MOVE WINDOW space | cmd + alt - n |  Move window to next space and follow
shift + alt - x |  MOVE WIN -> DISP | follow window recent monitor
shift + alt - h | SWAP WINDOWS | -m window --swap west
shift + alt - j | SWAP WINDOWS | -m window --swap south
shift + alt - k | SWAP WINDOWS | -m window --swap north
shift + alt - l | SWAP WINDOWS | -m window --swap east
shift + alt + cmd - h | RESIZE | -m window --warp west #move window
shift + alt + cmd - j | RESIZE | -m window --warp south
shift + alt + cmd - k | RESIZE | -m window --warp north
shift + alt + cmd - l | RESIZE | -m window --warp east
cmd + alt - n | SIP |  yabai -m space --focus next
alt - 1 | -m space --focus 1
alt - 2 | -m space --focus 2
alt - 3 | -m space --focus 3
alt - 4 | -m space --focus 4
alt - 5 | -m space --focus 5
alt - 6 | -m space --focus 6
alt - 7 | -m space --focus 7
alt - 8 | -m space --focus 8
alt - 9 | -m space --focus 9
shift + alt - 1 |  # Send window to space 1
shift + alt - 2 |  # Send window to space 2
shift + alt - 3 |  # Send window to space 3
shift + alt - 4 |  # Send window to space 4
shift + alt - 5 |  # Send window to space 5
shift + alt - 6 | # Send window to space 6
shift + alt - 7 | # Send window to space 7
shift + alt - 8 |  # Send window to space 8
shift + alt - 9 |  # Send window to space 9
ctrl + alt - n | -m display --focus next
ctrl + alt - 1 | -m display --focus 1
ctrl + cmd + shift - 1 | MOVE WIN -> DISP 1
ctrl + alt - 2 | -m display --focus 2
ctrl + alt + shift - 2 |  MOVE WIN -> DISP 2
ctrl + cmd - 3 | MOVE WIN -> DISP 3
shift + alt - a | -m window --move rel:-20:0 #move window
shift + alt - s | -m window --move rel:0:20
shift + alt - w | -m window --move rel:0:-20
shift + alt - d | -m window --move rel:20:0
cmd + alt - v | -m space --mirror y-axis #mirror tree y-axis
alt - z | WINDOW TOGGLE | -m window --toggle zoom-fullscreen
shift + alt - z | -m space --toggle {padding,gap} | # Zoom all (toggle desktop offset)
shift + alt - . | WINDOW | picture-in-picture this window
alt - .| WINDOW | -m window --toggle zoom-parent #toggle window parent zoom
alt - t | WINDOW TOGGLE | float / unfloat window and center on screen
alt + s | WINDOW TOGGLE | -m window --toggle sticky #toggle sticky
alt - f | LAYOUT | -m space --layout float
alt + cmd - f | WINDOW TOGGLE | -m window --toggle native-fullscreen
alt - r | rotate windows
alt + cmd - r | WINDOW TOGGLE | split horz|vert
alt + ctrl - b | WINDOW TOGGLE | -m window --toggle border
alt - b | LAYOUT | -m space --layout bsp
ctrl + shift + alt - up | -m window --grid 1:1:0:0:1:1 #make floating window fill screen
ctrl + shift + alt - down | -m window --grid 1:1:0:0:1:1 #make floating window fill screen
ctrl + shift + alt - left | -m window --grid 1:2:0:0:1:1 #make floating window fill left-half of screen
ctrl + shift + alt - right | -m window --grid 1:2:1:0:1:1 #make floating window fill right-half of screen
cmd - return | /Applications/Kitty.app/Contents/MacOS/kitty --single-instance -d ~ #open terminal
